reviewText: I thought this video would motivate me to ride my stationary bike, but unfortunately it's too boring. I will go back to watching TV or something else.

This is my second BOV!  Got three more on order.  The scenery is quite beautiful, I like the music, and love biking through the quaint towns.  These BOV's have enhanced my indoor biking experience.  Need to get another stationary bike soon so spouse and I can bike together. . . !  :-)

I use this for my easy indoor training. I don't care much for the soundtrack, so I turn off the volume, just something to watch on indoor easy days at 4am and there just isn't anything on TV except Zumba and Nutri-Bullet info-mericals.
I own over a dozen bike-o-vision.  This is one of my favorites.  Beautiful ride!!!  I'm not a fan of any of their background music.  I mute it and listen to my own music.  Highly recommend this one.
